subject: Re: hey Mike
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Misty,

Hey... thanks for the kind words about the videos!  I just wanted to 
help get the information out there so people can had an affordable 
method of experimenting with some different ghost box functionality 
devices.

No, Bruce, Steve, and I are not working together per-say unless you 
call everyone trying to see what we can all come up with in this 
field, is working together. I guess we are all working together using 
that definition, huh?  I just write to them on occassion.

I see you may already have been given access to the REG podcast, 
based on another post.  Let me know if that's not the case.

Orlando!  That is where I fly into, then I drive to Cocoa Beach.
Didn't get to see the shutle take-off though... cause they postponed 
it and I had to get back.  Then I get to Denver, they cancel all 
flights to Colorado Springs because of weather, so we take a taxi 
back to the Springs, but my luggage is still in Denver.  I hope I get 
to see it someday... I had some new clothes in there!!!

Sorry your 12-470 radio ended up that way.  Those wires are easy 
targets of getting snipped while closing the case.  They should use 
conectors for all that, but I guess that would be too expensive since 
they mass produce them.

Have a great day!
- Mike
